title: Commercial Armed Robbery Cricket Wireless store
body:
PG FWANTEDFOR COMMERCIAL ARMED ROBBERYAnyone with information that may assist in this investigation is asked to call CRIME SOLVERS at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477) or CID-Robbery Unit at 301-772-4905 as soon as possible.  Please refer to case number . Whenever information is given to the Prince George’s County Crime Solvers Line, you do not have to leave your name. A REWARD of up to $1000.00 is being offered for the tip that leads to the arrest and indictment of the suspects responsible for this robbery.               A cash reward of up to $1000.00 is being offered.           
Posted by


Prince George's County Police


at
